ezRNAseq
  • Reference

Plot Samples Count

Plot the total count per sample

plot_samples_count(data, color = "white", fill = "steelblue",
  main = "Total count per sample", ylab = "Number of mapped reads (x10^7)",
  xlab = "Sample", name.size = 8, ...)

Arguments

data
An object of class data.frame, matrix or SummarizedExperiment.
color
outline and fill colors.
fill
fill color for the bars
main
plot main title.
ylab
character vector specifying y axis labels. Use ylab = FALSE to hide ylab.
xlab
character vector specifying x axis labels, respectively. Use xlab = FALSE to hide xlab.
name.size
Change the sample name size
...
Add other arguments from ggbarplot to modify the plot appearance.

Value

Return a plot ggplot.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
